title: Optimization of Battery Cycle and Battery Life Prediction
description: Developed a predictive model using Regression and Neural Networks to forecast battery cycle life and identify key factors, enhancing accuracy through hyper-parameter tuning.

title: Agricultural Plant Disease Classifier
description: Implemented a CNN model for plant leaf disease prediction with 96% accuracy and developed a Streamlit app for user-friendly image uploads and predictions.

title: Text Summarizer using Google Pegasus LLM Model
description: Developed a text summarizer application using advanced NLP techniques for accurate and relevant summarization. Optimized and fine-tuned the model to ensure high-quality, coherent summaries suitable for practical use.

title: Predicting Fire Spread with AI: Enhancing Emergency Response in Building Fires
description: Developing 3D AutoCAD models and used PyroSim for fire simulation, implementing a GAN model for fire prediction and generating thermal profiles for enhanced safety assessment.
